props.name: priority
props.description: The priority of the notification (-2 to 2). -2 is lowest priority. If set to 2, you should also specify Retry and Expire.

props.name: retry
props.description: Works only if priority is set to 2. Specifies how often (in seconds) the Pushover servers will send the same notification to the user.

props.name: expire
props.description: Works only if priority is set to 2. Specifies how many seconds your notification will continue to be retried for (every retry seconds).

props.name: url
props.description: A supplementary URL to show with your message.

props.name: url_title
props.description: A title for the URL specified as the url input parameter, otherwise just the URL is shown.

props.name: timestamp
props.description: a Unix timestamp of a time to display instead of when our API received it.

props.name: device
props.description: The name of one of your devices to send just to that device instead of all devices.
